headline: Chinese-Americans Feel  Glare and Rush to Help
abstract: Facing the brunt of scrutiny in the United States, Chinese-Americans have also scrambled to help friends and family in China.
lead_paragraph: Amy Lee-Ludovicyâ€™s children and their classmates were supposed to be on a chartered bus into New York City on Friday morning, destined for a visit to Chinatown ahead of the Lunar New Year celebrations.
